    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Models of simple molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Modelle der einfachen Moleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèles des molécules simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelos de moléculas simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modelli delle molecole semplici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλα των απλών μορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelos de moléculas simples</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows models of simple compounds like water, methane and ammonia that are made up of the elements hydrogen, oxygen and nitrogen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Modelle der einfachen 
Mittel wie Wasser, Methan und Ammoniak, die die Elemente Wasserstoff, 
Sauerstoff und Stickstoff bestehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des modèles des 
composés simples comme l'eau, méthane et ammoniaque qui se composent
des éléments hydrogène, l'oxygène et azote.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostram modelos de compostos 
simples como a água, o methane e a amônia que são compostos dos 
elementos hidrogênio, oxigênio e nitrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i modelli dei residui
semplici come acqua, il metano e l'ammoniaca che si compongono degli 
elementi idrogeno, ossigeno ed azoto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μοντέλα των απλών 
ενώσεων όπως το ύδωρ, το μεθάνιο και την αμμωνία που 
αποτελούνται από το υδρογόνο, το οξυγόνο και το άζωτο στοιχείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los modelos de 
compuestos simples como el agua, el metano y el amoníaco que se 
componen de los elementos hidrógeno, oxígeno y nitrógeno.</string>
          </description>
